posts.post_content: This seems like something that would be best used in a suicide white deck. You'll hit yourself for eight if you use it after you declare an attack. It'll only take two aimed at you and one aimed at an opponent to take yourself out.

posts.post_content: I don't know if I'd say it's that bad.
